mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (reply_text, reply_writer, board_no, account) values (#{replyText}, #{replyWriter}, #{boardNo}, #{account})
mapper.select: select reply_no, reply_text, reply_writer , reply_date, board_no, account from tbl_reply where reply_no = #{replyNo}
select reply_no, reply_text, reply_writer , reply_date, board_no, account from tbl_reply where board_no = #{bn} order by reply_no limit #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
